commands.name: dev
commands.summary: Start both API (port 3001) and Web (port 3000) dev servers concurrently
commands.shellCommand: bash -lc "trap 'kill 0' EXIT; (cd apps/api && rushx dev) & (cd apps/web && rushx dev) & wait"
